item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Government Employees Insurance Company Logo
The Government Employees Insurance Company (GEICO /ˈɡaɪkoʊ/) is an American auto insurance company with headquarters in Maryland. It is the second largest auto insurer in the United States, after State Farm. GEICO is a wholly owned subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway that provides coverage for more than 24 million motor vehicles owned by more than 15 million policy holders as of 2017. GEICO writes private passenger automobile insurance in all 50 U.
You can download the GEICO logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: GEICO
item.description: The Government Employees Insurance Company (GEICO /ˈɡaɪkoʊ/) is an American auto insurance company with headquarters in Maryland. It is the second largest auto insurer in the United States, after State Farm. GEICO is a wholly owned subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway that provides coverage for more than 24 million motor vehicles owned by more than 15 million policy holders as of 2017. GEICO writes private passenger automobile insurance in all 50 U.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 MetLife Logo
MetLife, Inc. is the holding corporation for the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company (MLIC), better known as MetLife, and its affiliates. MetLife is among the largest global providers of insurance, annuities, and employee benefit programs, with 90 million customers in over 60 countries. The firm was founded on March 24, 1868. MetLife ranked No. 43 in the 2018 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.
You can download the MetLife logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MetLife
item.description: MetLife, Inc. is the holding corporation for the Metropolitan Life Insurance Company (MLIC), better known as MetLife, and its affiliates. MetLife is among the largest global providers of insurance, annuities, and employee benefit programs, with 90 million customers in over 60 countries. The firm was founded on March 24, 1868. MetLife ranked No. 43 in the 2018 Fortune 500 list of the largest United States corporations by total revenue.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Prudential Financial Logo Prudential Financial, Inc. is an American Fortune Global 500 and Fortune 500 company whose subsidiaries provide insurance, investment management, and other financial products and services to both retail and institutional customers throughout the United States and in over 40 other countries. Prudential Financial is the largest insurance company in the United States, with total assets amounting to approximately 1.456 trillion U.S. dollars. Principal products and services provided include life insurance, annuities, mutual funds, pension- and retirement-related banking & finances, administration and asset management, securities brokerage services.
You can download the Prudential Financial logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Prudential Financial
item.description: Prudential Financial, Inc. is an American Fortune Global 500 and Fortune 500 company whose subsidiaries provide insurance, investment management, and other financial products and services to both retail and institutional customers throughout the United States and in over 40 other countries. Prudential Financial is the largest insurance company in the United States, with total assets amounting to approximately 1.456 trillion U.S. dollars. Principal products and services provided include life insurance, annuities, mutual funds, pension- and retirement-related banking & finances, administration and asset management, securities brokerage services.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Ping An Insurance Logo Ping An Insurance known also as Ping An of China (Chinese: 中国平安; pinyin: Zhōngguó Píng Ān), full name Ping An Insurance (Group) Company of China, Ltd. is a Chinese holding conglomerate whose subsidiaries mainly deal with insurance, banking, and financial services. The company was founded in 1988 and has its headquarters in Shenzhen. “Ping An” literally means “safe and well”. Source
You can download the Ping An logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Ping An
item.description: Ping An Insurance known also as Ping An of China (Chinese: 中国平安; pinyin: Zhōngguó Píng Ān), full name Ping An Insurance (Group) Company of China, Ltd. is a Chinese holding conglomerate whose subsidiaries mainly deal with insurance, banking, and financial services. The company was founded in 1988 and has its headquarters in Shenzhen. “Ping An” literally means “safe and well”. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Nippon Life Insurance Company Logo Nippon Life Insurance Company is the largest Japanese life insurance company by revenue. The company was founded in 1889 as the Nippon Life Assurance Co., Inc. In structure it is a mutual company. It first paid policyholder dividends in 1898. Source Source
You can download the Nissay logo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bain Capital Logo Bain Capital is a private investment firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. It specializes in private equity, venture capital, credit, public equity, impact investing, life sciences and real estate. Bain Capital invests across a range of industry sectors and geographic regions. As of 2018, the firm managed more than $105 billion of investor capital. Source Source
You can download the Bain Capital logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Bain Capital
item.description: Bain Capital is a private investment firm based in Boston, Massachusetts. It specializes in private equity, venture capital, credit, public equity, impact investing, life sciences and real estate. Bain Capital invests across a range of industry sectors and geographic regions. As of 2018, the firm managed more than $105 billion of investor capital. Source Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
The Principal Financial Group Logo The Principal Financial Group is a global financial investment management and insurance company headquartered in Des Moines, Iowa Source Enter Lippincott, who, through leadership workshops, gained clarity on the vision and business objectives. Principal then conducted a global study of 1,200 employees to mine for perceived strengths and desired shifts in the brand evolution. Whether by geography, business unit or tenure, employees were calling for a strong signal about and recognition of the company’s next era — one that was already global, bolder, more collaborative, and more humanly and intellectually inclusive than ever before.
You can download the Principal logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Principal
item.description: The Principal Financial Group is a global financial investment management and insurance company headquartered in Des Moines, Iowa Source Enter Lippincott, who, through leadership workshops, gained clarity on the vision and business objectives. Principal then conducted a global study of 1,200 employees to mine for perceived strengths and desired shifts in the brand evolution. Whether by geography, business unit or tenure, employees were calling for a strong signal about and recognition of the company’s next era — one that was already global, bolder, more collaborative, and more humanly and intellectually inclusive than ever before.
